name: Battle Of Arcadia
description:
In Battle for Arcadia, you play as the owner of an arcade and you have to keep the machine running to make sure the players stays and give you money.

Use the mouse left click to move around. Pick up the coins on the ground by walking on them. Use the coins to keep the machines running by clicking on them.

Good luck !

Engine: Unity

Assets externes utilisés:

- Cartoon FX by Jean Moreno

Jeux réalisé lors VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021 par :

Nolan Gougeon

Thibault LeGorju

Daphné Renauld

Lorenzo Goyer

Luc Pacheco
